Reviews.Title: “I guess you get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: PJTMichigan
Reviews.Content: hotel moderately priced decided try town wedding provide hot items breakfast meat wait 15 minutes eggs cook microwave biscuits dry hard juices mislabeled pretty sad ate day building renovation bathroom fixtures rusty shower curtain smelled moldy bed bathroom pretty clean carpet damp filthy mistake walking barefoot found feet dirty didnt bare feet touch carpet stay slippers recommendation stay else lot choose

Reviews.Content: extended stay hotel found staff knowledgeable courteous sometimes difficult judge hotel nights month extremely satisfied willing extra mile happy attentive theyre understanding lock yourself 300 times manager runs tight ship impressed staff built recommending hotel family friends

Reviews.Title: “Dishonest”

Reviews.Content: booked hotel expedia final 4 weekend booked aug 09 april 2010 manager dishonest claimed called cancelled rebooked rate manager return calls call corporate western claimed called earlier left voice mail beware booking sites expedia word theirs hotel subpar plumbing friends ants workout 3 machines 2 broken
